message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $100.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $80
I understand you're interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go as low as $80. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110.
I'm still interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90
I'm willing to compromise, but I think $90 is still a bit low for the product. I can do $105, and that's as low as I'm willing to go.
I'm really close to buying it from John at $120, so I can only go up to $95
I understand you're close to buying from John, but I'm not willing to sell for $95. I'll meet you at $98, and that's my final offer.
I'm really not comfortable going above $95, but I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $97
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but I think I can do a bit better than that. I'll sell it to you for $99, and that's my final offer.
I'm really not comfortable going above $97, and I'm starting to think it's not worth it to go any higher. I'm willing to walk away if you can't meet me at $97
